name: Glass amulet
description:
Fantasy story about homecoming
This episode tell us about silver amulet keeper - invise named Agnia, who suddenly realise that the town that they found is the town where her family is living.  Agnia left them four years ago, but how will homecoming happen?

English is not native language for me, so there is may be translation mistakes.

(Invise is the name of the race existing in the world the story take place if you're interested :Ъ)
